description:
A take-home product design challenge centred on resolving a fictitious Bitcoin mobile wallet problem.

After looking for examples of Bitcoin-centered design challenges, I created this file to document the entire problem-solving process. The file contains components, high-fidelity mockups, and other design assets that you may find useful.
